definition: main point of an argument/a principal viewpoint
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: The melody is next taken up by flutes.
The rapprochement with the United States continued to dominate China's foreign affairs.
sentences.chinese: 當年中國外交事務的主調依然是和美國的友好關係。

sentences.english: The melody is next taken up by the flutes.
sentences.chinese: 這主調接著由橫笛合奏。

sentences.english: The main melody is very clear, and the supporting voice simply throws it into relief.
sentences.chinese: 它的主要特徵是主調鮮明突出，支聲僅起陪襯作用。
